articles.title: Hundreds of convictions, but a major mystery is still unsolved 3 years after the Jan. 6 Capitol riot - The Associated Press
articles.description: Three years after the attack on the U.S. Capitol, Washington’s federal courthouse is flooded with trials, guilty plea hearings and sentencings stemming from the largest criminal investigation in American history. And the hunt for suspects is far from over. Au…
articles.content:
WASHINGTON (AP) Members of far-right extremist groups. Former police officers. An Olympic gold medalist swimmer. And active duty U.S. Marines.
